name: 曾百由
objective: 變分法、目標函數選擇、最佳狀態回授控制、最佳狀態觀測器、最佳濾波器、最佳時間控制、最佳能量控制、最佳燃料控制。
schedule:
1-2. Static Optimization
3-5 Optimal Control of Continuous-Time Systems
6 Optimal Control of Discrete-Time Systems
7 Midterm Test
8-9 The Tracking Problem and Other LQR Extensions
10-12 Final-Time-Free and Constrained Input Control
13 Optimal Control for Polynomial Systems
14 Output Feedback and Structured Control
15-17 Robustness and Multivariable Frequency-Domain Techniques
18 Final Test
materials: Optimal Control, 2nd Edition by Frank L. Lewis, Vassilis L. Syrmos
